field.name: arkAttachmentArchetypeName
field.desc: Name of the archetype to use as an attachment

field.name: bIsIlluminatedSight
field.desc: This is an illuminated sight. No archetype is required.

field.name: colorIlluminatedSightsColour
field.desc: The colour of the illuminated sights.

field.name: attachmentAttachmentType
field.desc: Unique Id of attachment type. Add entries in /data/editor/WeaponsTemplates.xml

field.name: bAttachAtStart
field.desc: Is the attachment already attached to this weapon.

field.name: bHasWeaponOffset
field.desc: Tick this to allow weapon offsets to be applied on the parent weapon.

field.name: bWeaponOffsetOnlyInIronsight
field.desc: Only allow weapon offsets in ironsight.

field.name: arkIronsightOffsetCurve
field.desc: The curve that maps the current ironsight transition value (x axis 0-1) onto the amount of the offset applied (y axis 0-1)

field.name: bTriggersFoldingSights
field.desc: Set this to allow folding sights to trigger. Set the data for the transform under Folding Sights in the weapon xml

field.name: bRevealsHiddenMesh
field.desc: Set this to make any mesh that's hidden by the meshToHide property in the weapon properties visible again.

field.name: magazineUpgradeReplacement
field.desc: Replaces the max ammo in clip.

field.name: bNotAnAttachment
field.desc: Ignore this in the attachment count.

field.name: fReticleParticleScale
field.desc: This modifies the reticle particle scale if this attachment has a reticle particle.

field.name: fAttchamentPosX
field.desc: UI position X on screen (related to the weapon)

field.name: fAttchamentPosY
field.desc: UI position Y on screen (related to the weapon)
